cause.description:
Camp Adventure is a one-week get away camp for young cancer survivors and their siblings. Located on beautiful Shelter Island NY, and run by the American Cancer Society, this is a truly wonderful place for these kids to be. I know this very well being a former camper and 4 year cancer survivor. The experiences and memories at Camp Adventure are ones to cherish for a lifetime.
1. The battle against cancer is a difficult one. To have a place for children who have battled this horrible disease is truly special.
2. Cancer is one of the world's most deadly diseases, one that can tear families and lives apart.
cause.mission: Raise funds for Camp Adventure and the American Cancer Society
cause.name: Camp Adventure (by the American Cancer Society)
